# Fylu Marketing & Design Website

This is a Next.js website for Fylu Marketing & Design, a marketing agency that provides:
- Website development (all-inclusive packages)
- Flyer design
- Business cards
- Marketing materials and services

## Design Guidelines
- Use bright, vibrant colors
- Implement subtle, smooth animations
- Maintain a clean, sharp, and professional aesthetic
- Focus on modern web design principles
- Ensure responsive design for all screen sizes
